import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=_ref=>{let{onLogin}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);try{const res=await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/auth/login",{username,password});// Save token & role in localStorage
localStorage.setItem("token",res.data.token);localStorage.setItem("role",res.data.role);localStorage.setItem("username",res.data.username);alert("Welcome ".concat(res.data.username," (").concat(res.data.role,")"));onLogin();}catch(err){alert("Invalid username or password!");}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Password",type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:loading,children:loading?"Logging in...":"Login"})]})});};export default Login;
